      • CreateDataSet

        public CreateDataSet(int expand,
             boolean lenCord,
             boolean queryNorm,
             boolean useQstructure)
        Constructor
        参数:
        expand - Number of expansion of sub-query
        lenCord - Ask Zhuohao Li
        queryNorm - The norm which is used before
        useQstructure - Ask Zhuohao Li

    • 方法详细资料

      • create

        public void create(java.lang.String path,
          java.lang.String clickPath)
        Main method to get all the information from file and web and write into an ARFF file
        参数:
        path - The location of the file
        clickpath - The location of the file containing all click information
        percent - How many data I need

      • readFile

        private InstanceFromFile readFile(java.lang.String line)
        Get information from file
        参数:
        line - Each line of the file
        返回:
        The class containing all the information for the tuple (keyword,song)

      • readJSON

        private java.util.ArrayList<InstanceFromWeb> readJSON(java.lang.String strUrl)
                                               throws JSONGetterException
        Get information from web in JSON format
        参数:
        strUrl - Web address
        返回:
        The class containing all the information for the tuple keyword-song
        抛出:
        JSONGetterException - This will happen if you cannot connect to or get data from web in JSON

      • splitListIntoPair

        private java.util.ArrayList<PairInFile> splitListIntoPair(java.lang.String list)
        Split a String into an ArrayList
        参数:
        list - A specific kind of String
        返回:
        An ArrayList containing all the information

      • countBlanks

        private int countBlanks(java.lang.String s)
        Count how many blacks in a String
        参数:
        s - Any String
        返回:
        Number of blanks

      • readHTML

        private int[] readHTML(java.lang.String path)
                throws HTMLGetterException
        Get the information from web in HTML format
        参数:
        path - The address of the web
        返回:
        Play times and user numbers (seasonal)
        抛出:
        HTMLGetterException - This will happen if you cannot connect to or get data from web in HTML

      • manualRandom

        private java.lang.String manualRandom()
        Randomly generate D, E or F to occupy the space of manual label
        返回:
        D, E, F which can tell me where I have marked already

      • readClick

        private java.util.HashMap<java.math.BigInteger,java.lang.Integer> readClick(java.lang.String path)
        Read a file containing the click number for each song and store them in a HashMap
        参数:
        path - the location of the file
        返回:
        the HashMap containing all the click number
